Perpetual Potency (Chirurgeon).name: Perpetual Potency (Chirurgeon)
Perpetual Potency (Chirurgeon).description:
Your perpetual infusions improve, allowing you to use @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Quick Alchemy} to create more powerful items with no cost. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

Moderate @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AJ1dC7EtTIfBey0M]{Antidote} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.biRbqKo2C97XLfQ0]{Antiplague}.

Perpetual Potency (Mutagenist).name: Perpetual Potency (Mutagenist)
Perpetual Potency (Mutagenist).description:
Your perpetual infusions improve, allowing you to use @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Quick Alchemy} to create more powerful items with no cost. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

The moderate versions of the mutagens you chose for perpetual infusions.

Perpetual Potency (Toxicologist).name: Perpetual Potency (Toxicologist)
Perpetual Potency (Toxicologist).description:
Your perpetual infusions improve, allowing you to use @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Quick Alchemy} to create more powerful items with no cost. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

Choose two common 5th-level or lower alchemical poisons.

Polymath.name: 博学 Polymath
Polymath.description: 你的缪斯是万事通，涉足于不同的技能与爱好。如果是一个生物，那它可能是如精类的善变物种；如果是神明，可能是戴斯那或者卡莉斯翠。作为博学缪斯的诗人，你对大量的课题都拥有兴趣但是很少专注于其中之一，你也很少下定决心——你想尝试所有事物。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jBp91q4uzwd4FeSX]{多样表演 Versatile Performance} 专长，将 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.xqmHD8JIjak15lRk]{隐形仆役 Unseen Servant} 加入你的法术库。

Powerful Alchemy.name: Powerful Alchemy
Powerful Alchemy.description: Alchemical items you create on the fly are particularly potent. When you use @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Quick Alchemy} to create an infused alchemical item that allows a saving throw, you can change its DC to your class DC.

Powerful Fist.name: Powerful Fist
Powerful Fist.description: You know how to wield your fists as deadly weapons. The damage die for your fist increases to 1d6 instead of 1d4. Most people take a -2 circumstance penalty when making a lethal attack with nonlethal unarmed attacks, because they find it hard to use their fists with deadly force. You don't take this penalty when making a lethal attack with your fist or any other unarmed attacks.

Precise Strike.name: Precise Strike
Precise Strike.description:
You Strike with flair. When you have panache and you Strike with an agile or finesse melee weapon or agile or finesse unarmed attack, you deal 2 additional precision damage. If the strike is part of a finisher, the additional damage is 2d6 precision damage instead.

As your swashbuckler level increases, so does your additional damage for precise strike. Increase the amount of additional damage on a Strike and the number of additional dice on a finisher by one at 5th, 9th, 13th, and 17th levels.

Precision.name: Precision
Precision.description:
You have trained to aim for your prey's weak points. The first time you hit your hunted prey in a round, you also deal 1d8 additional precision damage. (Precision damage increases the damage you already deal, using the same type, but is ineffective against creatures that lack vital organs or weak points.)

At 11th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8 precision damage, and at 19th level, the extra damage increases to 3d8 precision damage.

Primal Hierophant.name: Primal Hierophant
Primal Hierophant.description: You command the most potent forces of primal magic and can cast a spell of truly incredible power. You gain a single 10th-level spell slot and can prepare a spell in that slot using primal spellcasting. You can't use this spell slot for abilities that let you cast spells without expending spell slots or that give you more spell slots. Unlike with other spell slots, you don't gain more 10th-level spells as you level up, though you can take the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Chu6s3xVnpOB64GH]{Hierophant's Power} feat to gain a second slot.

Primal Spellcasting.name: Primal Spellcasting
Primal Spellcasting.description:
The power of the wild world flows through you. You can cast primal spells using the Cast a Spell activity, and you can supply material, somatic, and verbal components when casting spells. Because you're a druid, you can usually hold a primal focus (such as holly and mistletoe) for spells requiring material components instead of needing to use a material component pouch.

At 1st level, you can prepare two 1st-level spells and five cantrips each morning from the common spells on the primal spell list, or from other primal spells to which you gain access. Prepared spells remain available to you until you cast them or until you prepare your spells again. The number of spells you can prepare is called your spell slots.

As you increase in level as a druid, the number of spells you can prepare each day increases, as does the highest level of spell you can cast.

Some of your spells require you to attempt a spell attack roll to see how effective they are, or have your enemies roll against your spell DC (typically by attempting a saving throw). Since your key ability is Wisdom, your spell attack rolls and spell DCs use your Wisdom modifier.

Quick Alchemy.name: Quick Alchemy
Quick Alchemy.description: If you need a specific alchemical item on the fly, you can use your infused reagents to quickly create it with the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.yzNJgwzV9XqEhKc6]{Quick Alchemy} action.

Quick Rage.name: Quick Rage
Quick Rage.description: You recover from your Rage quickly, and are soon ready to begin anew. After you spend a full turn without raging, you can Rage again without needing to wait 1 minute.

Rage.name: Rage
Rage.description:
Requirements You aren't fatigued or raging.

Grants @Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]{Effect: Rage}

You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall unconscious, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage on melee Strikes. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a -1 penalty to AC.
  • You can't use actions with the concentrate trait unless they also have the rage trait. You can Seek while raging.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.

Raging Resistance.name: Raging Resistance
Raging Resistance.description:
Repeated exposure and toughened skin allow you to fend off harm. While raging, you gain resistance equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier to damage types based on your instinct.

See specific instincts for more information.

Ranger Expertise.name: Ranger Expertise
Ranger Expertise.description: You've practiced your techniques to make them harder to resist. Your proficiency rank for your ranger class DC increases to expert.

Ranger Weapon Expertise.name: Ranger Weapon Expertise
Ranger Weapon Expertise.description:
You've dedicated yourself to learning the intricacies of your weapons. Your proficiency ranks for simple and martial weapons and unarmed attacks increases to expert.

You gain access to the critical specialization effects of all simple and martial weapons and unarmed attacks when attacking your hunted prey.

Reconfigure.name: 再配置 Reconfigure
Reconfigure.description:
你是所有手艺领域的专家，而且总是在调整你的大发明。你可以花费1天休整期进行修补，以改变大发明的一项改修。你尝试一次手艺检定，使用符合你等级的高DC。成功时，你选择一个大发明上的改修，将其改为相同类别（初始，突破，革命）不同改修。

如果你有任何改修专长，在成功的检定后你可以改为将改修专长重训成其他的改修专长。新专长必须满足重训的标准限制。

Red Dragon Instinct.name: Red Dragon Instinct
Red Dragon Instinct.description:
You summon the fury of a mighty dragon and manifest incredible abilities. Perhaps your culture reveres draconic majesty, or you gained your connection by drinking or bathing in dragon's blood or after watching a marauding wyrm burn your village.

  • Red Dragon
    • Type Chromatic
    • Breath Weapon Cone of Fire

Anathema

Letting a personal insult against you slide is anathema to your instinct. Choose whether your character respects or abhors your dragon type. If you respect it, defying such a dragon is anathema, and if you abhor it, failing to defeat such a dragon you come across is anathema.

Draconic Rage (Instinct Ability)

While raging, you can increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 4 and change its damage type to match that of your dragon's breath weapon instead of the damage type for your weapon or unarmed attack. If you do this, your Rage action gains the arcane and evocation traits, as well as the trait matching the damage type.

Specialization Ability

When you use draconic rage, you increase the additional damage from Rage from 4 to 8. If you have greater weapon specialization, instead increase the damage from Rage when using draconic rage from 8 to 16.

Raging Resistance

You resist piercing damage and the damage type of your dragon's breath weapon.

Redeemer.name: 救赎者 Redeemer
Redeemer.description:
你满怀仁慈与宽恕。你获得救赎瞥视（Glimpse of Redemption）神卫反应以及 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗 Lay on Hands} 虔诚法术。在善良信条之后，添加如下信条：

  • 对于犯下罪行的人，你必须首先尝试给予其赎罪的机会，而不是将其杀死或给予惩戒。如果他们不知悔改依旧作恶，你也许需要采取更为极端的手段。
  • 无论他人身份地位为何，你都必须对其报以同情和怜悯。

神卫反应 Champion's Reaction

@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tuZnRWHixLArvaIf]{救赎瞥视 Glimpse of Redemption} R

触发 一名敌人伤害了你的盟友，并且他们都在你周围15尺的范围内。

赎罪的幻景在敌人的脑海中闪现，罪恶的重负让他变得犹豫不决。这名敌人必须从下列选项中选择一个：

  • 这名盟友免受触发这次救赎瞥视的伤害。
  • 这名盟友在对抗触发这次救赎瞥视的伤害时获得针对所有伤害的抗力，数值等同于2+你的等级。在这次伤害效果结算完毕之后，这名敌人直到它下一回合结束为止获得力竭（Enfeebled）2。

神圣制裁 Divine Smite9级

拷问良心的内疚感袭向敢于蔑视救赎瞥视的敌人。因为造成伤害而触发了你救赎瞥视的敌人会承受等同于你魅力调整值的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续善良伤害} 。

升格 Exalt11级

你能保护多位盟友。你能够将来自救赎瞥视的抗力授予你自己以及你周围15尺内的所有盟友，包括触发反应动作的那位盟友，不过每个人获得的这个抗力都会减少2。

Research Field.name: Research Field
Research Field.description:
Your inquiries into the alchemical nature of the universe have led you to focus on a particular field of research. You might have a degree from a scientific institute, correspond with other researchers in your field, or work as a genius loner. Choose a field of research.

Your research field adds a number of formulas to your formula book; these are your signature items. When using a batch of infused reagents to create your signature items using advanced alchemy, you create three items instead of two. Each time you gain a level, you can swap one of your signature items with another formula in your formula book. This new signature item must be on your research field's list of possible signature items.

Resolve.name: 决意 Resolve
Resolve.description: 你的决意使你的意志如钢铁般坚毅。你在意志豁免上的熟练度提升至大师。当你在意志豁免中骰出了成功，你改为获得大成功。

Revelation Spells.name: Revelation Spells
Revelation Spells.description:
The powers of your mystery manifest in the form of revelation spells, which are a type of focus spell. Casting a revelation spell costs 1 Focus Point and increases the effects of your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{Oracular Curse}. You start with a focus pool of 2 Focus Points. You refill your focus pool during your daily preparations, and you can regain 1 Focus Point by spending 10 minutes using the Refocus activity to reconcile the conflicting or unconventional nature of your divine mystery.

Focus spells are automatically heightened to half your level rounded up. Focus spells don't require spell slots, and you can't cast them using spell slots (see @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.7AVspOB6ITNzGFZi]{Divine Spellcasting (Oracle)}). Taking feats can give you more focus spells and increase the size of your focus pool, though your focus pool can never hold more than 3 Focus Points.

Revelation spells have the cursebound trait, unlike other focus spells. This trait means they increase the severity of your oracular curse (see below) when cast. You can't cast a cursebound spell if you don't have an oracular curse.You learn two revelation spells at 1st level. The first is an initial revelation spell determined by your mystery. The second is an initial domain spell you select from one of the domains associated with your mystery, which you cast as a revelation spell, causing it to gain the cursebound trait.

Revolutionary Innovation.name: 革命性大发明 Revolutionary Innovation
Revolutionary Innovation.description:
你是空前绝后的天才，发明了一种能彻底颠复学术领域的技术——至少暂时颠复了你的大发明！为你的大发明选择一种革命性改修。如果愿意，你也可以选择一种同类的初始或突破性改修。

革命性护甲改修 Revolutionary Armor Modifications

  • 自动妨碍系统 Automated Impediments 你的护甲使用了一种电磁场，分谐波失真器，或其他技术让接近你的人难以移动，除非得到你的允许。当穿戴你的护甲时，对你的敌人来说，邻接你的所有空间都变成困难地形。
  • 能量屏障 Energy Barrier 你护甲的防御能消融任何种类的朝你袭来的能量。当穿戴你的护甲时，你获得所有能量伤害的抗力（强酸，寒冷，电击，火焰，力场，负能量，正能量，和音波），数值等于2+你等级的一半。你必须有谐波振荡器，金属电抗或燃素校准器改修才能选择该改修。
  • 极致抗力 Incredible Resistance 你改善了你的突破性改修所提供的抵抗伤害的能力。从你的大发明具有的下述突破性改修中选择一种：致密甲片，叠层网状织物，或张力吸收系统。将你从该改修中获得的抗力提升至你的等级而非你等级的一半。
  • 多重传感遮罩 Multisensory Mask (隐秘套装专用) 你在你的护甲上内建了一种多重传感遮罩，能从所有感官中扭曲你的轮廓，让你只留下朦胧的图像，沉闷的响声等等。当穿戴该护甲时，你对所有生物获得隐蔽，即使他们使用了非视觉的精确感官，例如蝙蝠的回声定位。和其他让你的位置保持明显的效果一样，你不能使用这种隐蔽躲藏Hide或潜行Sneak。如果你使用了敌意动作，隐蔽终止，直到你花费单动作重置了遮罩，这具有操作特征。
  • 完美堡垒 Perfect Fortification（力量套装专用） 你用如此重量级的防御系统全面强化了你的护甲，即使最致命的攻击也可能失去锋芒。每当你在穿戴这种护甲时承受重击，尝试一次 纯骰检定。成功时，重击变成普通命中。这不能与护命Fortification符文或其他通过纯骰检定抵消重击的效果叠加。另外，你获得2+你等级一半的精准伤害抗力。
  • 物理防御系统 Physical Protections 你的护甲有如此多的调整和预案，能够抵抗所有物理伤害。当穿戴你的护甲时，你获得全物理伤害（钝击，穿刺和挥砍伤害，也包括持续性流血伤害）的抗力，数值等于你等级的一半。你必须有致密甲片，叠层网状织物或张力吸收系统的突破性改修才能选择该改修。
  • 符文载体 Rune Capacity 你可能涉猎了一些山铜合金的研究，或发现了其他工程学解决方案，你按照某种方式建造了你的大发明，使其能够容纳一个额外的性能符文。你的大发明比普通的同类物品可以容纳1个额外的性能符文（最大可以用+3潜能护甲容纳4个性能符文）。

革命性构装体改修 Revolutionary Construct Modifications

  • 飞行底盘 Flight Chassis 你为构装体适配了一种飞行方式，例如添加了螺旋桨或用飞翼和轻质结构再造了构装体。你的大发明获得25尺飞行速度。
  • 奇迹器械 Miracle Gears 你完美配置了大发明的脑皮层，它变得更加智能。它的智力属性提升2，它从你知晓的语言中学会一种你所选的语言。你的构装体获得使用需要较高智力Intelligence才能使用的动作，例如胁迫Coerce和解译文书Decipher Writing。最后，你的构装体在两项你所选的基于智力或魅力的技能上获得传奇熟练度。你必须有惊奇器械改修才能选择该改修。
  • 抗性涂层 Resistant Coating 你的大发明难以被任何方式伤害。它获得5点全伤害抗力（除了精金）。
  • 符文基石 Runic Keystone 你在大发明中设计了一种类似符文石Runestone的装置，让它能够容纳一个性能符文，即使它不是武器或护甲。如果护甲性能符文能影响护甲的穿戴者，则能影响你的大发明自身。武器性能符文通常情况为武器提供的任何性能都应用在你的大发明的无武装攻击上，如常遵循所有需求（例如，斩首Vorpal符文只能应用在挥砍近战无武装攻击上）；如果符文只影响远程武器，除非大发明有内置的远程攻击（例如来自弹丸发射器初始改修的远程攻击），否则不会生效。如果符文通常影响武器的物理形态和外观，例如无相Glamered，该符文雕刻在你的构装体中时不会生效。
  • 防壁部署 Wall Configuration 你的大发明能够从可移动的构装体变成静止的战场碉堡。它可以花费2动作的行动展开，该行动具有操作特征，并从通常形态转变成又薄又直的金属墙，高10尺且长30尺。这堵墙必须穿过大发明的起始空间。当你的构装体是墙时，它不能进行任何动作，除了使用相同的行动变回来，它也不能轻易保护自己，陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及} 并在AC上承受额外的-2状态减值。墙会阻挡视线和效果线，除非你的大发明的HP降低至最大值的一半以下，此时墙上的洞能让生物看穿并利用掩蔽攻击，超小型生物也能直接穿过墙壁。

革命性武器改修 Revoluitionary Weapon Modifications

  • 攻击校准器 Attack Refiner 你的武器在每次失手后都会精确地重新校准，保证下一击的命中。你的大发明获得回摆和猛推特征。
  • 致命打击 Deadly Strike 通过精确计算，你找到了大发明的完美形状，得以在恰到好处的打击中造成极大的伤害。你的大发明获得致命d8特征。如果你的大发明已经致命，它的致命骰提升至d12而非获得致命d8。
  • 伤害强化 Enhanced Damage 你让你的大发明比同类武器更强。将大发明的武器伤害骰提升1级（d4到d6，d6到d8，d8到d10，d10到d12）。如常，你不能将你的骰子提升超过1级，因此这个改修不能和简易复杂化叠加。
  • 延展武器 Extended Weapon（近战专用） 你找到了一种建造武器的方法，让他能在平衡性不变的情况下延展出去。你的大发明获得长触及特征。如果该武器已经有长触及特征，将你的触及提升10尺，而非通常的5尺。
  • 梦幻合金 Impossible Alloy 其他发明家声称这在技术上绝不成立，但你成功创造了数种似乎。只有你能使用的金属合金。这些合金能够伤害对7种天金中任意一种易伤的对手。你的大发明被视为所有7种天金（渊铀Abysium，精金Adamantine，血汞Djezet，虚铅Inubrix，零晶Noqual，山铜Orichalcum，漠石Siccatite）。这意味着你能对多种生物造成更多的伤害，但你不会应用任何这些天金制成的武器所具有的特殊效果。
  • 动量维持器 Momentum Retainer（近战专用） 一种特殊的配重装置让你的武器在攻击时能维持更多的动量。你的武器获得叠劲和多用B特征。
  • 全距稳定系统 Omnirange Stabilizers（远程专用） 你调整了你的大发明，让它在任何射程上都十分危险和高效。如果你的大发明具有远射特征，则移除远射特征。否则，将大发明的射程增量提升50尺或武器的基本射程增量，选择更大的数值。
  • 符文载体Rune Capacity 你可能涉猎了一些山铜合金的研究，或发现了其他工程学解决方案，你按照某种方式建造了你的大发明，使其能够容纳一个额外的性能符文。你的大发明比普通的同类物品可以容纳1个额外的性能符文（最大可以用+3潜能武器容纳4个性能符文）。

Rogue Expertise.name: Rogue Expertise
Rogue Expertise.description: Your techniques are now harder to resist. Your proficiency rank for your rogue class DC increases to expert.

Rogue's Racket.name: Rogue's Racket
Rogue's Racket.description: As you started on the path of the rogue, you began to develop your own style to pursue your illicit activities. Your racket shapes your rogue techniques and the way you approach a job, while building your reputation in the criminal underworld for a certain type of work. A client with deep pockets might even hire a team of rogues for a particular heist, each specializing in a different racket, in order to cover all the bases. Choose a rogue's racket.

Ruffian.name: Ruffian
Ruffian.description:
You prefer to strong-arm or intimidate others rather than rely on finesse or fancy tricks. You might be an enforcer for organized crime, a highway bandit, or a noble who bullies others with threats of your family's power. Or, you might use your skills on the up and up, in a private security detail or as a guard in a city with the right temperament.

You use whatever tools you have at hand to get the job done. You can deal sneak attack damage with any simple weapon, in addition to the weapons listed in the sneak attack class feature. When you critically succeed at an attack roll using a simple weapon and the target has the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} condition (unable to focus on defending itself), you also apply the critical specialization effect for the weapon you're wielding. You don't gain these benefits if the weapon has a damage die larger than d8 (after applying any abilities that alter its damage die size).

You're trained in Intimidation and medium armor. You can choose Strength as your key ability score. When you gain light armor expertise, you also gain expert proficiency in medium armor, and when you gain light armor mastery, you also gain master proficiency in medium armor.

Rune Patron.name: Rune Patron
Rune Patron.description:
Your patron is one of sigils and symbols, tomes and texts, words and wisdom.

Spell List arcane

Patron Skill Arcana

Hex Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.UmXhuKrYZR3W16mQ]{Discern Secrets}

Granted Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TFitdEOpQC4SzKQQ]{Magic Weapon}

Runelord Specialization.name: Runelord Specialization
Runelord Specialization.description:
You draw untold power from runes, sometimes called sin magic. You associate with one of the seven vices, also known as the seven rewards of rule: envy (abjuration), gluttony (necromancy), greed (transmutation), lust (enchantment), pride (illusion), sloth (conjuration), and wrath (evocation). Studying these techniques often tempts you with the associated sin. While leaning into it could corrupt you, it might make you more powerful. If you choose this class archetype, you must select @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mz2x4HFrWT8usbEL]{Runelord Dedication} as your 2nd-level class feat.

Prerequisites You must be a wizard specializing in one of the seven schools other than divination.

Runelord Adjustments In addition to the normal school spell for your chosen school of magic, you learn the initial rune spell associated with your school, with its school adjusted to your chosen school of magic if it wasn't from that school already. Your pool of Focus Points increases to 2 Focus Points. At 8th level, you also learn the advanced rune spell associated with your school, also adjusting its school to match your chosen school of magic if it wasn't already, and your pool of Focus Points increases to 3 Focus Points.

You can Refocus by indulging in your school's sin in lieu of studying your spellbook. As you become more powerful, your indulgence grows. At 12th level, if you indulge in your sin to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus}, if you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1. At 18th level, if you indulge in your sin to Refocus, if you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 3 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

You are trained in martial polearms. At 11th level, if you gain @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.9XLUh9iMepZesdmc]{Weapon Expertise}, you become an expert in martial polearms.

Finally, you lose the ability to prepare or cast any spell from your school's prohibited schools. You remove all spells of those schools from your spell list, meaning you can't even activate scrolls or wands of such spells.

Additional Feats 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.z0HX5L7bOOrKi0dD]{Tattoo Artist}

Scoundrel.name: Scoundrel
Scoundrel.description:
You use fast-talking, flattery, and a silver tongue to avoid danger and escape tricky situations. You might be a grifter or con artist, traveling from place to place with a new story or scheme. Your racket is also ideal for certain reputable professions, like barrister, diplomat, or politician.

When you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against melee attacks you attempt against it until the end of your next turn. On a critical success, the target is flat-footed against all melee attacks until the end of your next turn, not just yours.

You're trained in Deception and Diplomacy. You can choose Charisma as your key ability score.

Second Doctrine.name: Second Doctrine
Second Doctrine.description:
You gain the second benefit of your doctrine:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sa7BWfnyCswAvBVa]{Cloistered Cleric}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.D34mPo29r1J3DPaX]{Warpriest}

Second Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).name: Second Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)
Second Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).description: Your proficiency rank for Fortitude saves increases to expert.

Second Path to Perfection.name: Second Path to Perfection
Second Path to Perfection.description:
You've learned to find perfection in every success. Choose a different saving throw than the one you chose for your path to perfection. Your proficiency rank for the chosen saving throw increases to master. If you roll a success with the chosen saving throw, you instead critically succeed.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.XZnPwZ0ohlDXlFea]{Second Path to Perfection (Fortitude)}

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.yDL9l9Klki6gE2ZD]{Second Path to Perfection (Reflex)}

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RVPhB0RqmoJg7xI6]{Second Path to Perfection (Will)}

Second Path to Perfection (Fortitude).name: Second Path to Perfection (Fortitude)
Second Path to Perfection (Fortitude).description:
You've learned to find perfection in every success.

Choose a different saving throw than the one you chose for your path to perfection. Your proficiency rank for the chosen saving throw increases to master. If you roll a success with the chosen saving throw, you instead critically succeed.

Second Path to Perfection (Reflex).name: Second Path to Perfection (Reflex)
Second Path to Perfection (Reflex).description:
You've learned to find perfection in every success.

Choose a different saving throw than the one you chose for your path to perfection. Your proficiency rank for the chosen saving throw increases to master. If you roll a success with the chosen saving throw, you instead critically succeed.

Second Path to Perfection (Will).name: Second Path to Perfection (Will)
Second Path to Perfection (Will).description:
You've learned to find perfection in every success.

Choose a different saving throw than the one you chose for your path to perfection. Your proficiency rank for the chosen saving throw increases to master. If you roll a success with the chosen saving throw, you instead critically succeed.

Second Skin.name: Second Skin
Second Skin.description: Your armor has become akin to a second skin for you. Your proficiency ranks for light armor, medium armor, and unarmored defense increase to master. When wearing light or medium armor, you can rest normally, rather than receiving poor rest that leaves you fatigued.

Shared Reflexes.name: Shared Reflexes
Shared Reflexes.description: You and your eidolon boost each other's reflexes, allowing you both to roll away from danger. Your proficiency rank for Reflex saves and your eidolon's proficiency rank for Reflex saves increase to expert.

Shared Resolve.name: Shared Resolve
Shared Resolve.description: You and your eidolon steel your mind together against effects that threaten you, each protecting the others' minds from danger. Your and your eidolon's proficiency ranks for Will saves increase to master. When you roll a success on a Will save, you get a critical success instead. When your eidolon rolls a success on a Will save, it gets a critical success instead.

Shared Vigilance.name: Shared Vigilance
Shared Vigilance.description: You and your eidolon work together to remain alert to threats around you, allowing you to perceive far more together than you could individually. Your proficiency rank in Perception and your eidolon's proficiency rank in Perception increase to expert.

Shark Animal Instinct.name: Shark Animal Instinct
Shark Animal Instinct.description:
The fury of a wild predator fills you when you Rage, granting you ferocious unarmed attacks. Cultures that revere vicious animals (such as apes or bears) give rise to barbarians with this instinct. You might also be at war with an uncontrollable, animalistic side of your personality, or you might be a descendant of a werewolf or another werecreature.

  • Shark Instinct
    • Jaws (Grapple, Unarmed) 1d10 Piercing

Anathema

Flagrantly disrespecting an animal of your chosen kind is anathema to your instinct, as is using weapons while raging.

Bestial Rage (Instinct Ability)

When you Rage, you gain your chosen animal's unarmed attack (or attacks). The specific attack gained, the damage it deals, and its traits are listed on Table 3–3: Animal Instincts. These attacks are in the brawling group. Your Rage action gains the morph, primal, and transmutation traits.

Specialization Ability

Increase the damage die size for the unarmed attacks granted by your chosen animal by one step, and increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 5 for your chosen animal's unarmed attacks. The frog's tongue attack and deer's antler attack gain reach 10 feet. If you have greater weapon specialization, increase the damage from Rage from 5 to 12 for your chosen animal's unarmed attacks.

Raging Resistance

You resist piercing and slashing damage.

Shield Block.name: 盾牌格挡 Shield Block
Shield Block.description: 你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡} 通用专长，这是一个能让你利用盾牌降低受到伤害的反应。

Shootist's Edge.name: Shootist's Edge
Shootist's Edge.description: You make shots others find impossible. Your proficiency rank for your gunslinger class DC increases to master. When using a ranged weapon in which you have master or greater proficiency, you ignore the penalty for attacking within the weapon's second and third range increments.

Signature Spells.name: 标志性法术 Signature Spells
Signature Spells.description:
经验让你能更加灵活的施展某些法术。

每个你获得的法术级数上你都可以选择一个该等级的法术作为标志性法术。你不需要学习标志性法术的升阶版本；相反，你可以自由升阶这些法术。如果你学习了一个超过原本等级的标志性法术，你可以无需学习便施展这个法术的低级版本。如果你替换了标志性法术，你可以重新选择一个相同等级的新标志性法术。

你还可以通过重训在不替换法术的情况下改变标志性法术，这会花费和通常重训法术相同的时间。

Silver Dragon Instinct.name: Silver Dragon Instinct
Silver Dragon Instinct.description:
You summon the fury of a mighty dragon and manifest incredible abilities. Perhaps your culture reveres draconic majesty, or you gained your connection by drinking or bathing in dragon's blood or after watching a marauding wyrm burn your village.

  • Silver Dragon
    • Type Metallic
    • Breath Weapon Cone of Cold

Anathema

Letting a personal insult against you slide is anathema to your instinct. Choose whether your character respects or abhors your dragon type. If you respect it, defying such a dragon is anathema, and if you abhor it, failing to defeat such a dragon you come across is anathema.

Draconic Rage (Instinct Ability)

While raging, you can increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 4 and change its damage type to match that of your dragon's breath weapon instead of the damage type for your weapon or unarmed attack. If you do this, your Rage action gains the arcane and evocation traits, as well as the trait matching the damage type.

Specialization Ability

When you use draconic rage, you increase the additional damage from Rage from 4 to 8. If you have greater weapon specialization, instead increase the damage from Rage when using draconic rage from 8 to 16.

Raging Resistance

You resist piercing damage and the damage type of your dragon's breath weapon.

Singular Expertise.name: Singular Expertise
Singular Expertise.description:
You have particular expertise with guns and crossbows that grants you greater proficiency with them and the ability to deal more damage. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls with firearms and crossbows.

This intense focus on firearms and crossbows prevents you from reaching the same heights with other weapons. Your proficiency with unarmed attacks and with weapons other than firearms and crossbows can't be higher than trained, even if you gain an ability that would increase your proficiency in one or more other weapons to match your highest weapon proficiency (such as the weapon expertise feats many ancestries have). If you have gunslinger weapon mastery, the limit is expert, and if you have gunslinging legend, the limit is master.

Skillful Lessons.name: Skillful Lessons
Skillful Lessons.description: At 3rd level and every odd-numbered level thereafter, you gain a skill feat. This feat must be for an Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill, or for the skill you gained from your methodology.

Slippery Mind.name: Slippery Mind
Slippery Mind.description: You play mental games and employ cognitive tricks to throw off mind-altering effects. Your proficiency rank for Will saves increases to master. When you roll a success at a Will save, you get a critical success instead.

Snake Animal Instinct.name: Snake Animal Instinct
Snake Animal Instinct.description:
The fury of a wild predator fills you when you Rage, granting you ferocious unarmed attacks. Cultures that revere vicious animals (such as apes or bears) give rise to barbarians with this instinct. You might also be at war with an uncontrollable, animalistic side of your personality, or you might be a descendant of a werewolf or another werecreature.

  • Snake Instinct
    • Fangs (Grapple, Unarmed) 1d10 Piercing

Anathema

Flagrantly disrespecting an animal of your chosen kind is anathema to your instinct, as is using weapons while raging.

Bestial Rage (Instinct Ability)

When you Rage, you gain your chosen animal's unarmed attack (or attacks). The specific attack gained, the damage it deals, and its traits are listed on Table 3–3: Animal Instincts. These attacks are in the brawling group. Your Rage action gains the morph, primal, and transmutation traits.

Specialization Ability

Increase the damage die size for the unarmed attacks granted by your chosen animal by one step, and increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 5 for your chosen animal's unarmed attacks. The frog's tongue attack and deer's antler attack gain reach 10 feet. If you have greater weapon specialization, increase the damage from Rage from 5 to 12 for your chosen animal's unarmed attacks.

Raging Resistance

You resist piercing and slashing damage.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
When your enemy can't properly defend itself, you take advantage to deal extra damage. If you Strike a creature that has the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} condition with an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, or a ranged weapon attack, you deal an extra 1d6 precision damage. For a ranged attack with a thrown melee weapon, that weapon must also be agile or finesse.

As your rogue level increases, so does the number of damage dice for your sneak attack. Increase the number of dice by one at 5th, 11th, and 17th levels.

Sorcerer Spellcasting.name: Sorcerer Spellcasting
Sorcerer Spellcasting.description:
Sorcerer Spellcasting

Your bloodline provides you with incredible magical power. You can cast spells using the Cast a Spell activity, and you can supply material, somatic, and verbal components when casting spells. Because you're a sorcerer, you can usually replace material components with somatic components, so you don't need to use a spell component pouch.

Each day, you can cast up to three 1st-level spells. You must know spells to cast them, and you learn them via the spell repertoire class feature. The number of spells you can cast each day is called your spell slots.

As you increase in level as a sorcerer, your number of spells per day increases, as does the highest level of spells you can cast.

Some of your spells require you to attempt a spell attack roll to see how effective they are, or have your enemies roll against your spell DC (typically by attempting a saving throw). Since your key ability is Charisma, your spell attack rolls and spell DCs use your Charisma modifier.

Heightening Spells

When you get spell slots of 2nd level and higher, you can fill those slots with stronger versions of lower-level spells. This increases the spell's level to match the spell slot. You must have a spell in your spell repertoire at the level you want to cast in order to heighten it to that level. Many spells have specific improvements when they are heightened to certain levels. The signature spells class feature lets you heighten certain spells freely.

Cantrips

A cantrip is a special type of spell that doesn't use spell slots. You can cast a cantrip at will, any number of times per day. A cantrip is always automatically heightened to half your level rounded up-this is usually equal to the highest level of spell you can cast as a sorcerer. For example, as a 1st-level sorcerer, your cantrips are 1st-level spells, and as a 5th-level sorcerer, your cantrips are 3rd-level spells.

Sparkling Targe.name: 闪耀法盾 Sparkling Targe
Sparkling Targe.description:
你钻研魔法的应用，训练自身不仅是展现那些进攻手段还包括防御的战术。当魔法流淌于你体内时，你的盾牌便可挡下本不可阻挡的东西，甚至是一条龙的吐息或者魔法飞弹（magic missile）。

你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡} 通用专长。

当你举起你的盾牌并处于奥术奔涌（Arcane Cascade）架式时，你从你的盾牌获得的AC环境加值同样可以运用到你对抗法术和其他魔法效应的豁免中。另外，当一个法术或魔法效应的结果会对你造成伤害且你处于奥数奔涌状态时，其会触发你的盾牌格挡（Shield Block）反应，甚至这种伤害非物理。当通过这种手段阻挡伤害时，提高你盾牌的硬度（Hardness），其数值等同于奥术奔涌额外伤害（通常是1，如果具有武器专精（weapon specialization）则为2，如果具有高等武器专精（greater weapon specialization）则为3）。无论你是使用一面真实盾牌、护盾术（shield）或者其他像盾牌一样运作的东西（例如，如果你具有举起书卷（Raise a Tome）专长时举起一本书），其收益都会生效。

汇聚法术 Conflux Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.53NqGTJOf4LcjVyD]{盾牌打击}

Spell Blending.name: 法术交融 Spell Blending
Spell Blending.description: 你认为法术位是所有施法本源的速记，并且你找到了一个修补法术位机制的方法，将它们合并以产生更强大的法术。当你进行每日准备时，你可以把两个同环级法术位换成一个奖励法术位，这个奖励法术位的环位最高可以比你所提供的法术位的环级高2环。你想这样交换多少法术位都可以。奖励法术位的环级必须是你能施展的，同时每个奖励法术位的环级不可相同。你也可以将一个任何环级的法术位换成2个戏法，但你这样换成额外戏法的作法，每次只能用一个法术位去作交换。

Spell Repertoire (Bard).name: 法术库（吟游诗人） Spell Repertoire (Bard)
Spell Repertoire (Bard).description:
你的法术集合被称为法术库。1级时，你将学会所选的两个1级异能法术和5个所选的异能戏法。你可以从异能法术列表中的通用法术进行选择，或者从你可以获取的其他异能法术中进行选择。你可以使用对应级数的法术位施展任何你法术库中的法术。

你提升等级的时候法术库也会扩大。每次你获得一个法术位时，你可以将一个同等级的法术加入法术库中。2级时，你可以选择另一个1级法术；3级时你可以选择两个2级法术，以此类推。当你添加这些法术时，你可以添加已有法术的高级版本，这样你就可以施展这个法术的升阶版本了。

虽然获得的速度相同，你的法术位和法术库中的法术是分离的。如果一个专长或者其他能力将法术加入你的法术库当中，你不会获得另一个法术位，反之亦然。

替换法术库中的法术

Spell Repertoire (Oracle).name: Spell Repertoire (Oracle)
Spell Repertoire (Oracle).description:
The collection of spells you can cast is called your spell repertoire. At 1st level, you learn two 1st-level spells of your choice and five cantrips of your choice. You choose these from the common spells from the divine spell list, or from other divine spells to which you have access. You can cast any spell in your spell repertoire by using a spell slot of an appropriate spell level.

You add to this spell repertoire as you increase in level. Each time you get a spell slot, you add a spell of the same level to your spell repertoire. At 2nd level, you select another 1st-level spell; at 3rd level, you select two 2nd-level spells, and so on. When you add spells, you might choose a higher-level version of a spell you already have so that you can cast a heightened version of that spell.

Though you gain them at the same rate, your spell slots and the spells in your spell repertoire are separate. If a feat or other ability adds a spell to your spell repertoire, it wouldn't give you another spell slot, and vice versa.

Swapping Spells in your Repertoire

As you gain new spells in your spell repertoire, you might want to replace some of the spells you previously learned. Each time you gain a level and learn new spells, you can swap out one of your old spells for a different spell of the same level. This spell can be a cantrip. You can also swap out spells by retraining during downtime.

Spell Repertoire (Sorcerer).name: Spell Repertoire (Sorcerer)
Spell Repertoire (Sorcerer).description:
The collection of spells you can cast is called your spell repertoire. At 1st level, you learn two 1st-level spells of your choice and four cantrips of your choice, as well as an additional spell and cantrip from your bloodline. You choose these from the common spells from the tradition corresponding to your bloodline, or from other spells from that tradition to which you have access. You can cast any spell in your spell repertoire by using a spell slot of an appropriate spell level.

You add to this spell repertoire as you increase in level. Each time you get a spell slot, you add a spell of the same level to your spell repertoire. At 2nd level, you select another 1st-level spell; at 3rd level, you select two 2nd-level spells, and so on. When you add spells, you might choose a higher-level version of a spell you already have so that you can cast a heightened version of that spell.

Though you gain them at the same rate, your spell slots and the spells in your spell repertoire are separate. If a feat or other ability adds a spell to your spell repertoire, it wouldn't give you another spell slot, and vice versa.

Swapping Spells in your Repertoire

As you gain new spells in your spell repertoire, you might want to replace some of the spells you previously learned. Each time you gain a level and learn new spells, you can swap out one of your old spells for a different spell of the same level. This spell can be a cantrip. You can also swap out spells by retraining during downtime.

Spell Repertoire (Summoner).name: Spell Repertoire (Summoner)
Spell Repertoire (Summoner).description:
The collection of spells you can cast is called your spell repertoire. At 1st level, you learn two 1st-level spells of your choice and five cantrips of your choice. You choose these from the common spells from the tradition corresponding to your eidolon, or from other spells from that tradition to which you have access. You can cast any spell in your spell repertoire by using a spell slot of an appropriate spell level. Your spell slots and the spells in your spell repertoire are separate. If a feat or other ability adds a spell to your spell repertoire, it doesn't give you another spell slot, and vice versa.

You add to this spell repertoire as you increase in level. Each time you get a spell slot (see Table 2-4: Summoner Spells per Day), you add a spell of the same level to your spell repertoire. At 2nd level, you select another 1st-level spell. At 3rd level, you add the first 2nd-level spell to your repertoire. At 4th level you gain your second and your spell repertoire reaches its maximum size of five spells.

At 5th level, in addition to adding two 3rd-level spells to your repertoire, you lose your lowest level of spell slots. Any time you lose a level of spell slots, you lose two spells in your repertoire as well. These can come from spells you already know or out of the number of new spells you're learning. On levels in which you don't change your spell slots, you can swap out multiple spells, as described below.

Swapping Spells in Your Repertoire

As you gain new spells in your repertoire, you might want to replace some of the spells you previously learned. Each time you gain a level and learn new spells, you can swap out one of your old spells for a different spell of the same level. If it's a level at which you lose a set of lower-level slots, you can replace the two in either order. You can also instead swap a cantrip. You can also swap out spells by retraining during downtime.

At 6th level and every even level thereafter, you can swap out any number of your spells for different spells of a level you can cast. When you do, you must keep at least one spell you can cast with your lowest level of spell slots so you don't end up with slots you can't use. For instance, at 6th level you would need to keep at least one 2nd-level spell, but all your other spells could be 3rd level.

Spell Substitution.name: 法术替换 Spell Substitution
Spell Substitution.description: 你不接受一旦法术准备好，直到你下一次日常准备之前都无法改变它们的事实，而你找到了一条捷径，让你可以用新法术代替那些你已经准备好的法术。你可以花10分钟将一个准备好的法术位弄空，并从你的法术书里拿另一个法术放进去。如果你在替换途中被打断，原本的法术依然保持准备好的状态，还是可以施放。你之后可以继续尝试替换，但你必须重头来过。

Spellstrike.name: 法术打击 Spellstrike
Spellstrike.description:
你学习了基本的魔战士技能，让你可以将魔法与物理攻击结合在一起。你获得了 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QDW9H8XLIjuW2fE4]{法术打击} 动作。

法术打击说明 Spellstrike Specifics

虽然基础法术打击规则已经复盖了大多数法术，但是当你将法术装填进你的双拳、剑刃或其他攻击方式中时，数个调整会应用到更加复杂的法术中。

单目标 One Target 法术只能以你的打击（Strike）的对象为目标，即使它通常可以影响到更多目标。一些专长会让你影响到更多生物。

触及范围 Reach: 被注入的法术根据你进行法术打击的武器或无武装攻击的触及范围来影响目标。例如，如果你使用一件具有长触及（reach）特征的武器，电爪（shocking grasp）将能影响到一个超出你双手触及的生物，并且冰冻射线（ray of frost）将只能影响一个你武器触及范围内的生物，即使法术射程更远。

附属效应 Ancillary Effects 你的法术依然具有任何无目标（non-target）效应，例如任何从你用打击（Strike）命中后开始的持续效应。例如，酸液飞溅（acid splash）将依然能对目标以外的其他生物造成它的溅射伤害（splash damage）并且绊足术（tanglefoot）的环境减值依然在它通常的持续时间内持续。法术生效在打击造成伤害后；如果打击具有其他特殊效应，GM决定他们是在法术前还是后生效。

复合防御 Multiple Defenses 任何在最初法术攻击骰以后的掷骰依然如常进行，例如解离术（Disintegrate）目标的强韧（Fortitude）豁免骰。同样的，一个允许你用其在后续轮（subsequent rounds）再次攻击的法术将只会在其最初攻击骰时与打击相结合，后续攻击骰不再受其影响。

无效或免疫的目标 Invalid or Immune Target 如果你打击的目标是法术的无效目标，法术依然会被消耗（expended）但不会影响目标。如果目标只对你的攻击而非法术免疫，其依然受到法术影响。

可变动作 Variable Actions 一些法术基于你释放时使用的动作数来决定不同的效应。当你使用法术打击时，你选择是否使用1或者2动作版本的法术效应。一个法术必须正好花费1或者2动作；你不能使用花费一个自由动作（free action）、反应（reaction）或者3或更多动作的法术进行法术打击。

超魔 Metamagic 你当然不能在法术打击时使用超魔，因为超魔需要你的下一个动作为施放法术（Cast a Spell），而法术打击是一个并不符合的混合（combined）动作。

Spirit Instinct.name: Spirit Instinct
Spirit Instinct.description:
Whether you are emotionally sensitive to the spirits around you; worship ancestors or apparitions; or are haunted by the specter of an ancestor, relative, friend, or foe, your rage takes the form of a spiritual possession.

Anathema

Disrespecting corpses or spirits is anathema to your instinct; defending yourself against undead creatures is not.

Spirit Rage (Instinct Ability)

When raging, you can increase the additional damage from Rage from 2 to 3 and change its damage type to negative or positive, instead of the damage type for your weapon or unarmed attack (choose each time you Rage). If you choose to deal negative or positive damage, your weapon or unarmed attack gains the effects of the ghost touch property rune, which makes it more effective against incorporeal creatures, and your Rage action gains the divine and necromancy traits, plus negative or positive, as appropriate.

Specialization Ability

When using spirit rage, increase the damage from Rage from 3 to 7. If you have greater weapon specialization, instead increase the damage when using spirit rage to 13.

Raging Resistance

You resist negative damage, as well as damage dealt by the attacks and abilities of undead creatures, regardless of the damage type.

Staff Nexus.name: Staff Nexus
Staff Nexus.description:
Your thesis maintains that early and intense adoption of staves from the first days of study can create a symbiotic bond between spellcaster and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FVjTuBCIefAgloUU]{Staff}, allowing them to create remarkable magic together. You've formed such a connection with a makeshift staff you built, and you are ready to infuse any staff you encounter with greater power.

You begin play with a makeshift staff of your own invention. It contains one cantrip and one 1st-level spell, both from your spellbook, but it gains no charges normally during your preparations; you must expend a spell slot to grant it charges in the same way you would add additional charges to a normal staff. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} your makeshift staff into any other type of staff for the new staff's usual cost, adding the two spells you originally chose to the staff you Craft.

At 8th level, you can expend two spells instead of one when preparing your staff, adding additional charges equal to the combined levels of the expended spells. At 16th level, you can expend up to a total of three spells to add charges to the staff, adding additional charges equal to the combined levels of all three spells.

Starlit Span.name: 星火流矢 Starlit Span
Starlit Span.description:
苍穹之下，魔法无所界限，而你已不用受到物理上相邻范围的限制。你的力量延伸到你的感官所能察觉之处，超越了你和你目标之间的空间，即使法术通常需要直接的物理接触。

当你使用法术打击（Spellstrike），你可以使用远程武器（ranged weapon）或远程无武装（ranged unarmed）打击，只要目标处于你远程武器或远程无武装攻击的第一射程增量（first range increment）中。 即使法术的射程短于你远程攻击的射程增量，你也可以传递法术。

汇聚法术 Conflux Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.nVfP43Xbs6I1PO8v]{流星击}

Stone Order.name: Stone Order
Stone Order.description: You're as enduring as stone, and you take comfort in its steadfast presence, both natural and worked. You're trained in Crafting. You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QEOe9AhQzdqIx1ei]{Steadying Stone} druid feat. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.AiWtiVmyasyL42J8]{Crushing Ground} order spell. Poisoning or polluting the land and heedlessly carving the earth to plunder its natural resources are anathema to your order (this doesn't prevent you from responsibly digging or mining).

Storm Order.name: Storm Order
Storm Order.description:
You carry the fury of the storm within you, channeling it to terrifying effect and riding the winds through the sky.

You are trained in Acrobatics. You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UpEjRfQkCJCruAfb]{Storm Born} druid feat. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ho1jSoYKrHUNnM90]{Tempest Surge} order spell, and you increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. Polluting the air or allowing those who cause major air pollution or climate shifts to go unpunished is anathema to your order. (This doesn't force you to take action against merely potential harm to the environment or to sacrifice yourself against an obviously superior foe.)

Strategic Strike.name: Strategic Strike
Strategic Strike.description:
When you strike carefully and with forethought, you deal a telling blow. When making a Strike that adds your Intelligence modifier on your attack roll due to @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.lgo65ldX7WkXC8Ir]{Devising a Stratagem}, you deal an additional 1d6 precision damage.

As your investigator level increases, so too does the deadliness of your strategic strike. Increase the number of dice by one at 5th, 9th, 13th, and 17th levels.

Stubborn.name: Stubborn
Stubborn.description: You don't like being told what to do, and you don't give up. Your proficiency rank for Will saves increases to expert. When you fail, but don't critically fail, a Will save against an effect that would give you the controlled condition, you can attempt a second save against the effect at the start of your next turn. On a successful second save, the controlled condition ends, though any other effects remain. As normal, failing this second save doesn't allow you to attempt a third save on the subsequent turn.

Studious Spells.name: 虔心法术 Studious Spells
Studious Spells.description:
你的融汇研究（hybrid study）给予你额外的法术以增强你战斗中的能力。你获得两个特殊的2环虔心法术位，其可以被用于准备蛛行术（spider climb）、克敌机先（true strike）、水中呼吸（water breathing）和取决于你融汇研究的额外法术。你从此职业专长中添加任意法术到你的法术书中。在11级时，额外的法术位提升到3环，并且你添加加速术（haste）和一个取决于你融汇法术的额外法术。在13级，额外的法术位提升到4环，并且你添加飞行术（fly）和一个取决于你融汇法术的额外法术。

诡笑锋影 Laughing Shadow 7级： @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{镜影术 Mirror Image}; 11级： @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lONs4r14LEBZRLLw]{转移责任 Shift Blame}; 13级： @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元门 Dimension Door}

闪耀法盾 Sparkling Targe 7级： @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{抵抗能量伤害 Resist Energy}; 11级： @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.CIjj9CU5ekeq1oLT]{攻性防护 Warding Aggression}; 13级： @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{石肤术 Stoneskin}

星火流矢 Starlit Span 7级： @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pZTqGY1MLRjgKasV]{黑暗视觉 Darkvision}; 11级： @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.it4ZsAi6XgvGcodc]{风墙术 Wall of Wind}; 13级： @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{行动自如 Freedom of Movement}

无当重刃 Inexorable Iron 7级： @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{变巨术 Enlarge}; 11级： @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gPvtmKMRpg9I9D7H]{地缚术 Earthbind}; 13级： @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ksLCg62cLOojw3gN]{次元锚 Dimensional Anchor}

Stylish Tricks.name: Stylish Tricks
Stylish Tricks.description: At 3rd level, 7th level, and 15th level, you gain a skill feat. This feat must be for Acrobatics or the trained skill from your swashbuckler's style

Summoner Spellcasting.name: Summoner Spellcasting
Summoner Spellcasting.description:
Your link to your eidolon grants you limited magic connected to your eidolon's nature. You can cast spells using the Cast a Spell activity, and you can supply material, somatic, and verbal components when casting spells. Because of the magic you draw from your eidolon, you can usually replace material components with somatic components, so you don't need a material component pouch.

Each day, you can cast one 1st-level spell and five cantrips. You must know spells to cast them, and you learn them via the spell repertoire class feature. The number of spells you can cast each day is called your spell slots.

As you increase in level as a summoner, the magical link with your eidolon grants you additional, more powerful spell slots. Your total number of spell slots and the highest level of spells you can cast are shown in Table 2-4: Summoner Spells per Day. Because of the way you draw magic from your connection to your eidolon, you begin to lose lower-level spell slots once you reach 5th level. The maximum number of spell slots you get from the summoner class is four, starting when you reach 4th level.

Some of your spells require you to attempt a spell attack roll to see how effective they are, or have your enemies roll against your spell DC (typically by attempting a saving throw). Since your key ability is Charisma, your spell attack rolls and spell DCs use your Charisma modifier. Details on calculating these statistics appear on page 447 of the Core Rulebook.

Heightening Spells

When you gain spell slots of 2nd level and higher, you can fill those slots with stronger versions of lower-level spells. This increases the spell's level, heightening it to match the spell slot. Many spells have specific improvements when they are heightened to certain levels.

Cantrips

A cantrip is a special type of spell that doesn't use spell slots. You can cast a cantrip at will, any number of times per day. A cantrip is always automatically heightened to half your level rounded up-this is usually equal to the highest level of spell you can cast as a summoner. For example, as a 1st-level summoner, your cantrips are 1st-level spells, and as a 5th-level summoner, your cantrips are 3rd-level spells.

Superstition Instinct.name: Superstition Instinct
Superstition Instinct.description:
A deep distrust of magic drives you to forgo and counter the metaphysical nonsense of spellcasters. Whether you're a member of a superstitious family or culture that distrusts magic, a warrior in constant battle against wizards and witches, a survivor of a magical accident that instilled an intense aversion in your mind and body, or a scion of a bloodline known for its magic resistance, your rage is inimical to magic.

This makes you an excellent mage hunter but slow to trust practitioners of magical arts. Your extremely restrictive anathema grants you powers beyond those of other instincts.

Anathema

Willingly accepting the effects of magic spells (including from scrolls, wands, and the like), even from your allies, is anathema to your instinct. You can still drink potions and invest and activate most magic items you find, though items that cast spells are subject to the same restrictions as all other spells. If an ally insists on using magic on you despite your unwillingness, and you have no reason to believe they will stop, continuing to travel with that ally of your own free will counts as willingly accepting their spells (as do similar circumstances) and thus is also anathema to your instinct.

Superstitious Resiliance (Instinct Ability)

While raging, you gain a +2 status bonus to all saves against magic. Increase your damage from Rage from 2 to 4 against creatures that can cast spells. Once every 10 minutes, when you Rage, you regain Hit Points equal to the temporary Hit Points you gain from that Rage action.

Specialization Ability 7th

Increase the damage from Rage from 4 to 8 against creatures that can cast spells. If you have greater raging specialization, instead increase the damage from Rage to 12 against creatures with spells and 8 against other creatures.

Raging Resistance 9th

Choose two associated magical traditions: arcane and occult, arcane and primal, divine and occult, or divine and primal. The resistance from your raging resistance class feature applies against all damage you take from spells cast with these two traditions of magic, regardless of the type of damage dealt by the spell.

Surprise Attack.name: Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: You spring into combat faster than foes can react. On the first round of combat, if you roll Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures that haven't acted are flat-footed to you.

Swashbuckler Expertise.name: Swashbuckler Expertise
Swashbuckler Expertise.description: You perform swashbuckling techniques with exceptional flair, making them harder to resist. Your proficiency rank for your swashbuckler class DC increases to expert.

Swashbuckler's Style.name: Swashbuckler's Style
Swashbuckler's Style.description: As a swashbuckler, you have your own distinctive style that enables you to gracefully handle everyday events and life-or-death situations alike. Choose a swashbuckler's style. This style determines the additional actions you use to gain panache and makes you trained in the skill related to that action.

Swift Prey.name: Swift Prey
Swift Prey.description: You size up your prey with only a glance. You can use Hunt Prey as a free action if it's your first action of your turn.

Tempest.name: Tempest
Tempest.description:
An oracle wields divine power, but not from a single divine being. This power could come from a potent concept or ideal, the attention of multiple divine entities whose areas of concern all touch on that subject, or a direct and dangerous conduit to raw divine power. This is the oracle's mystery, a source of divine magic not beholden to any deity.

Your mystery might represent a pantheistic devotion to all the deities with power over the subject of your mystery, veneration of a particular ideal, or a conduit to raw divine energy. Whatever its origin and nature, your mystery determines the revelation spells you can cast and the oracular curse that overtakes your body when you do. You learn skills related to that mystery, gain access to a cantrip, and gain a special benefit drawn from the combined divine knowledge and experience of your mystery.

The fury of the wind and waves pounds in your heart, whether your power flows from natural storms, a conduit to the elemental Planes of Air and Water, or through reverence of deities such as Gozreh, the tengu god of storms Hei Feng, the demon lord Dagon, or the elemental lords of air and water.

Mystery Benefit

You can see perfectly through wind and water, and you send electric charges through both air and water. You never take penalties to Perception from wind, rain, fog, or other precipitation, or from looking through water or being underwater, and such conditions don't cause anything to be concealed from you.

When you deal physical damage with a non-cantrip air or water spell, you deal an additional 1 electricity damage per spell level.

Trained Skill Nature

Granted Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kBhaPuzLUSwS6vVf]{Electric Arc}

Revelation Spells

  • Initial @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EzB9i7R6aBRAtJCh]{Tempest Touch};
  • Advanced @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LFSwMtQVP05EzlZe]{Thunderburst};
  • Greater @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zhqnMOVPzVvWSUbC]{Tempest Form}

Related Domains Air, Water

Curse of the Perpetual Storm

You are the center of your own tiny tempest, ever surrounded by wind and rain that worsens the more you tap into your elemental powers. Even when you are calm and at rest, your hair and clothing are blown about by gentle winds, you are slightly damp, and your touch often comes with a static shock.

Minor Curse

An aura of a whirling storm whips up in a 5-foot emanation around you and in your space. The aura puts out small non-magical fires 1 round after they're lit or brought into your aura.

Electrical energy builds up within your storm, turning you into a lightning rod; you gain weakness 2 to electricity, and electricity spells or effects that have additional effects for a creature wearing or holding metal treat you as though you were wearing metal.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.IvXLHQySVNj4qMOi]{Effect: Minor Tempest Curse}

Moderate Curse

Your minor curse's aura expands to a 10-foot emanation and carries rain on the winds. The whirling winds impose a -2 circumstance penalty on ranged attack rolls using physical ammunition that target you or originate from you.

Your weakness to electricity increases to 5 or half your level, whichever is greater, but torrential rain grants you an equal amount of fire resistance.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.fyuZlKJ4N0zScltj]{Effect: Moderate Tempest Curse}

Major Curse (11th)

Your minor curse's aura expands to a 15-foot emanation and grows stronger. High winds blowing outward in the aura impede creatures' progress. The aura is difficult terrain for Large and smaller creatures on the ground, and for Huge or smaller flying creatures. You aren't affected by this difficult terrain.

The electricity arcing through you becomes dangerous. Any creature that touches you, including with a touch spell or a melee unarmed attack, takes [[/r {1d6}[electricity]]]{1d6 electricity damage}.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.jB6iDPaOSWrgxsEh]{Effect: Major Tempest Curse}

Tempest Mystery (Multiclass).name: Tempest Mystery (Multiclass)
Tempest Mystery (Multiclass).description:
The fury of the wind and waves pounds in your heart, whether your power flows from natural storms, a conduit to the elemental Planes of Air and Water, or through reverence of deities such as Gozreh, the tengu god of storms Hei Feng, the demon lord Dagon, or the elemental lords of air and water.

The Tenets of Evil.name: 邪恶信条 The Tenets of Evil
The Tenets of Evil.description:
所有邪恶阵营的神卫都要遵循下列信条

  • 你绝不能做出触犯你神祇禁忌的行为，或自愿去做纯粹的善行，例如仅因悲悯而付出、施放善良法术或使用善良物品。
  • 你绝不能把他人的利益放在自己之前，而你也绝不能把自己的利益放在你的神祇之前。虽然你可以采取看上去是在帮助他人的举动，但这种行动最终必须能预见将为有利于你或你的主人的目标。

The Tenets of Good.name: 善良信条 The Tenets of Good
The Tenets of Good.description:
所有善良阵营的神卫遵循如下信条。

  • 你绝不触犯你所侍奉的神祇的禁忌，绝不自愿犯下邪恶行为，例如谋杀、拷问或是施展邪恶法术。
  • 你绝不故意伤害无辜，绝不在明知有能力阻止时放任无辜者受到伤害。这个信条并不会强迫你针对可能在未来不确定的时间里对无辜者造成的伤害采取行动，也不会迫使你为保护他们而献出生命。

Thief.name: Thief
Thief.description:
Nothing beats the thrill of taking something that belongs to someone else, especially if you can do so completely unnoticed. You might be a pickpocket working the streets, a cat burglar sneaking through windows and escaping via rooftops, or a safecracker breaking into carefully guarded vaults. You might even work as a consultant, testing clients' defenses by trying to steal something precious.

When a fight breaks out, you prefer swift, lightweight weapons, and you strike where it hurts. When you attack with a finesse melee weapon, you can add your Dexterity modifier to damage rolls instead of your Strength modifier.

You are trained in Thievery.

Third Doctrine.name: Third Doctrine
Third Doctrine.description:
You gain the third benefit of your doctrine:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.s8WEmc4GGZSHSC7q]{Cloistered Cleric}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Zp81uTBItG1xlH4O]{Warpriest}

Third Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).name: Third Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric)
Third Doctrine (Cloistered Cleric).description: Your proficiency ranks for divine spell attack rolls and spell DCs increase to expert.

Third Doctrine (Warpriest).name: Third Doctrine (Warpriest)
Third Doctrine (Warpriest).description:
You gain expert proficiency with your deity's favored weapon.

When you critically succeed at an attack roll using that weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect; use your divine spell DC if necessary.

Third Path to Perfection.name: Third Path to Perfection
Third Path to Perfection.description:
You have made great progress in your personal studies of enlightenment. Choose one of the saving throws you selected for path to perfection or second path to perfection. Your proficiency rank for the chosen type of save increases to legendary. When you roll a critical failure on the chosen type of save, you get a failure instead. When you roll a failure on the chosen type of save against an effect that deals damage, you take half damage.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.dUMsM0yDTCdV31p6]{Third Path to Perfection (Fortitude)}

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.8kukH9c4h82e3qjl]{Third Path to Perfection (Reflex)}

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.oVNRYF0FHbH8NsJD]{Third Path to Perfection (Will)}

Third Path to Perfection (Fortitude).description:
